The Mini-Mafia split back up again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

Kracken: I won=
't ask. Hey! Look! Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start with one, don't targe=
t another till he's done!

Kracken fires 2 missiles at Razorclaw. Horn Dril=
 fires a drill missile, with the power of about 2 missiles because it's pac=
ked with acidic material and explosives and just waiting to explode, and he=
 fired this single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas fires a bolt of electricity =
from his hand at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a fireball at Razorclaw. Beholde=
r 2 fires 3 beams, they travel in waves toward Razorclaw...

l Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=

  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


  OOC: No=
, 2 missles out of one missle luancher.  If you have two, than you can 
  2=
 from each of them.  Oh, sorry, didnt know what EMPs did. I'll take that 
 =
 back. 

  :::Sharpedge/Godfather/Hellbat/Sharpedge/Treadshot/Torca/Starscr=
eam::: 

  ::He dodges the missles but gets hit by a charge andthe optic bl=
asts.  he 
  fires 2 missles at Hot Rod.  Godfather uses his jetpack to go =
over all the 
  shots.  Staying in the air, he fired 15 shots from his pist=
ol at Teltoli.  
  Hellbat gets knocked out from the EMP.  Hearing what FZ =
said, Sharpedge opens 
  up a comm to the Mafia:: 
  Sharpedge: Mafia, do n=
ot for Mobster yet.  We must wait until they are 
  weakened! Zardus' order=
s. 
  ::Treadshot transforms to tank mode and lobbed 2 missles at Razor Cla=
w. Torca 
  hears Klant's words:: 
  Torca: Thats alright, well wait here t=
ill you ARE ready.

from
